name: add
description: Command to add [sections], [documents] and [credentials] to the documentation that will be generated.

exampleCodes.title: Command
exampleCodes.description: This command can be used with the following options

attributes.name: section | s
attributes.description: Command that automatically generates section files

attributes.name: document | d
attributes.description: Command that automatically generates document files

attributes.name: credential | d
attributes.description: Command that automatically generates credential files
